sentences.en: A green manure is a crop grown mainly to improve soil fertility.
sentences.cn: 种植绿肥作物主要是为使土壤更加肥沃.

sentences.en: Bits of manure clung to his shoes and trousers.
sentences.cn: 皮鞋和裤子上沾着斑斑点点的粪块.

sentences.en: If farm - yard manure is used it must be well rotted.
sentences.cn: 如果使用农场的粪肥,必须让它完全腐烂.

sentences.en: Lacking manure and water, crops won't grow well.
sentences.cn: 庄稼缺肥缺水就长不好.

sentences.en: Pig - breeding not only improves the people's diet; it makes more manure available.
sentences.cn: 养猪不独可以改善人民生活, 还能多积肥料.

sentences.en: The farmers distributed manure over a field.
The farmers used manure to keep up the fertility of their land.
sentences.cn: 农夫们用粪保持其土质的肥沃.

sentences.en: The farmers were distributing manure over the field.
The manure can only be spread on the land at certain times.
sentences.cn: 厩肥只能在一定的季节撒到田间.

sentences.en: The peasants are distributing manure over the rice field.
sentences.cn: 农民们正在把肥料撒在稻田里.

sentences.en: These school children regularly help the production teams collect manure and do weeding ; they often do good deeds like this.
sentences.cn: 这些小学生经常帮生产队积肥、锄草,诸如此类的好事他们还做过很多.

sentences.en: They hauled feedlot manure from the ranches to fertilize their fields.
sentences.cn: 他们从牧场的饲养场拖走肥料去肥田.

sentences.en: They started me off in the gardens as a handyman. Digging, forking manure, that kind of thing.
sentences.cn: 他们让我先在园子里干些杂活，挖土、叉粪肥之类的。

sentences.en: To manure land is to spread manure on it.
sentences.cn: 给土地施肥是把粪肥洒在土地上.

trans.tran_en: waste matter from animals that is mixed with soil to improve the soil and help plants grow
